title: Otha Paarvaiyil Lyrics Kadamban
stanzas:
hey Otha paarvaiyil
yaendi enna nee
padam potu kattura.

moththa aasaiyum oru sera
unn kaekkuthe parimaara
buththi maaruthe
pozhuthellaam.
malaiyera.

Otha paarvaiyil
yaendi enna nee
padam potu kattura.

oore paakka
poren unna thookka.
kaaththum poovum kooda
kannil paakkaama
kaalam pooraa unna
kadhal seiven kaekaama

yedhedho yemaathura
en nenja paazhaakkura
aagaatha pechcha pesi
aala soodethura
mmm

Otha paarvaiyil
paarvaiyil
padam potu kattura.
koththu saaviyaa
saaviyaa
idupporam maattura

Vaasal .. thaandi..
vaaren una vendi.
yen vaazhka pooraa
unna serndhaa podhaathu
vazhve neeyaa maara
kodi jenmam theeraathe

aiyaiyyo un pechula
aagaayam en kaiyila
yaeththaatha enna
neeyum aasa pallaakkula.

hey Otha paarvaiyil
Â enna yaendi
padam potu kattura.

moththa aasaiyum oru sera
unn kaekkuthe porai yeara
buththi maaruthe
pozhuthellaam.
veriyaera....

seo.title: Otha Paarvaiyil Lyrics Kadamban
seo.description: Get the complete  Otha Paarvaiyil Lyrics Kadamban from Kadamban. composed by Yuvan and sung by Sri Madhumitha. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
